part_1.name: Adaptability
part_1.effect: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

part_1.name: Aerilate
part_1.effect: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves and get a power boost.

part_1.name: Aftermath
part_1.effect: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a contact move.

part_1.name: Air Lock
part_1.effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

part_1.name: Analytic
part_1.effect: Boosts the power of moves if the Pokémon moves last.

part_1.name: Anger Point
part_1.effect: Maxes out the Pokémon's Attack stat if it takes a critical hit.

part_1.name: Anticipation
part_1.effect: The Pokémon shudders if the foe has a super-effective move.

part_1.name: Arena Trap
part_1.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

part_1.name: Aroma Veil
part_1.effect: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

part_1.name: As One
part_1.effect: Combines the effects of two Abilities: Unnerve and Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh.

part_1.name: Aura Break
part_1.effect: Reverses the effects of aura Abilities.

part_1.name: Bad Dreams
part_1.effect: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

part_1.name: Ball Fetch
part_1.effect: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from a failed capture throw of a wild Pokémon.

part_1.name: Battery
part_1.effect: Powers up the Special Attack of allies.

part_1.name: Battle Armor
part_1.effect: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

part_1.name: Battle Bond
part_1.effect: Transforms the Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent. Water Shuriken becomes more powerful.

part_1.name: Beast Boost
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

part_1.name: Berserk
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Special Attack stat when its HP drops below half.

part_1.name: Big Pecks
part_1.effect: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.

part_1.name: Blaze
part_1.effect: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

part_1.name: Bulletproof
part_1.effect: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

part_1.name: Cheek Pouch
part_1.effect: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

part_1.name: Chilling Neigh
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when it knocks out a Pokémon.

part_1.name: Chlorophyll
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

part_1.name: Clear Body
part_1.effect: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

part_1.name: Cloud Nine
part_1.effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

part_1.name: Color Change
part_1.effect: The Pokémon's type changes to the type of the move it's hit by.

part_1.name: Comatose
part_1.effect: The Pokémon is always treated as if it's asleep, but can still attack.

part_1.name: Competitive
part_1.effect: Boosts the Special Attack stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

part_1.name: Compound Eyes
part_1.effect: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon's moves.

part_1.name: Contrary
part_1.effect: Makes stat changes have the opposite effect.

part_1.name: Corrosion
part_1.effect: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

part_1.name: Cotton Down
part_1.effect: Lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon on the field, except the user, when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

part_1.name: Cud Chew
part_1.effect: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will eat it one more time at the end of the next turn.

part_1.name: Curious Medicine
part_1.effect: When the Pokémon enters the battle, it resets all stat changes for all allies.

part_1.name: Cursed Body
part_1.effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

part_1.name: Cute Charm
part_1.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

part_1.name: Damp
part_1.effect: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

part_1.name: Dancer
part_1.effect: Copies the opponent's dance moves.

part_1.name: Dark Aura
part_1.effect: Powers up the Dark-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

part_1.name: Dauntless Shield
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat when it enters a battle.

part_1.name: Dazzling
part_1.effect: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from priority moves.

part_1.name: Defeatist
part_1.effect: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack stats when its HP is below half.

part_1.name: Defiant
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

part_1.name: Delta Stream
part_1.effect: Creates strong winds that protect Flying-type Pokémon from their weaknesses.

part_1.name: Desolate Land
part_1.effect: Creates harsh sunlight that evaporates Water-type moves.

part_1.name: Disguise
part_1.effect: Allows the Pokémon to escape damage from an attack once, then changes its appearance.

part_1.name: Download
part_1.effect: Adjusts power according to the foe's lowest defensive stat.

part_1.name: Drizzle
part_1.effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

part_1.name: Drought
part_1.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

part_1.name: Dry Skin
part_1.effect: Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and restores it in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Fire-type moves do more damage.

part_1.name: Early Bird
part_1.effect: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

part_1.name: Earth Eater
part_1.effect: If the Pokémon is hit by a Ground-type move, its HP is restored instead of taking damage.

part_1.name: Effect Spore
part_1.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

part_1.name: Electric Surge
part_1.effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

part_1.name: Electromorphosis
part_1.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses.

part_1.name: Emergency Exit
part_1.effect: The Pokémon switches out of battle when its HP drops below half.

part_1.name: Fairy Aura
part_1.effect: Powers up the Fairy-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

part_1.name: Filter
part_1.effect: Reduces the power of super-effective attacks taken.

part_1.name: Flame Body
part_1.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

part_1.name: Flare Boost
part_1.effect: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

part_1.name: Flash Fire
part_1.effect: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

part_1.name: Flower Gift
part_1.effect: Boosts the Attack and Special Defense stats of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

part_1.name: Flower Veil
part_1.effect: Prevents allies that are Grass-type from having their stats lowered.

part_1.name: Fluffy
part_1.effect: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

part_1.name: Forecast
part_1.effect: The Pokémon transforms with the weather.

part_1.name: Forewarn
part_1.effect: Determines what moves an opposing Pokémon has.

part_1.name: Friend Guard
part_1.effect: Reduces damage done to allies.

part_1.name: Frisk
part_1.effect: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

part_1.name: Full Metal Body
part_1.effect: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

part_1.name: Fur Coat
part_1.effect: Halves the damage from physical moves.

part_1.name: Galvanize
part_1.effect: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and get a power boost.

part_1.name: Gluttony
part_1.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

part_1.name: Good as Gold
part_1.effect: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon complete immunity to status moves.

part_1.name: Gooey
part_1.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

part_1.name: Gorilla Tactics
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first move selected.

part_1.name: Grass Pelt
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

part_1.name: Grassy Surge
part_1.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

part_1.name: Grim Neigh
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Special Attack stat when it knocks out a Pokémon.

part_1.name: Guard Dog
part_1.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

part_1.name: Gulp Missile
part_1.effect: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will return with a catch. When hit, it will spit out the catch at the attacker.

part_1.name: Guts
part_1.effect: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts its Attack stat.

part_1.name: Hadron Engine
part_1.effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Special Attack stat on Electric Terrain.

part_1.name: Harvest
part_1.effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

part_1.name: Healer
part_1.effect: Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.

part_1.name: Heatproof
part_1.effect: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves.

part_1.name: Heavy Metal
part_1.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

part_1.name: Honey Gather
part_1.effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

part_1.name: Huge Power
part_1.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
